name: Nitrox Subnautica
author: admin@example.com
description: Nitrox multiplayer mod server for Subnautica

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl unzip jq
ARCH=$(uname -m)
if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then
    ARCH="x64"
elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then
    ARCH="arm64"
fi
URL=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/SubnauticaNitrox/Nitrox/releases/latest | jq -r ".assets[] | select(.name | contains(\"linux_${ARCH}\")) | .browser_download_url")
echo "Downloading from: $URL"
curl -L -o nitrox.zip "$URL"
unzip -o nitrox.zip
rm nitrox.zip
chmod +x Nitrox.Server.Subnautica 2>/dev/null || true
chmod +x Nitrox.Launcher 2>/dev/null || true
echo "Installation complete"
